public class Modify_Customer_Controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable

Modify Customer Controller

This class manages all the inner workings of the modify customer menu.

    • click_modify_customer

      public void click_modify_customer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException

      Click Modify Customer

      This method is used to delete the existing customer from the database and then add a new updated one using the provided information. If any of the information is incorrect then this method will raise popup errors.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException
